tweet: Anger is weakness. It will just bring you pain. Love is strength. Express it and gain.
Let go of resentments because it's a fact: when you hang onto anger it's yourself you attack.
Be unique and express your truth in every moment and transaction.
You're not living if you're not laughing. No matter how bad it is or difficult it gets, find a way to laugh and enjoy the world.
Find your voice. Don't be afraid to poke your head above the clouds.
